result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.dispoDesc: Dismissed & Read-In to 16CM23.  *Bond on file to be applied toward restitution in 16CM23.

Supplement to Disposition (Restitution)

Attorney Erik C. Johnson in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
16CM23, 16CT35, 15CT48, 15CM18 & 15TR161 tracking together:
Atty Johnson asks that all the matters track together.
BY THE COURT:  All cases above will track.

Atty Johnson asks for a plea/sentencing date.

BY THE COURT:  Set for plea/sentencing.
bond continued.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 20, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Final pre-trial at 08-05-2016 08:30 am.
Jury trial at 09-15-2016 08:30 am.

Defendant Patrick Schaefer in court with attorney Erik C. Johnson.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Atty Johnson asks for a trial to be set on the matters.  Atty Johnson doesn't feel the traffic matters need to be set for trial.

BY THE COURT:  Set for Trial on the two criminal matters.
bond continued.
Traffic matters will continue to track.  Jury trial scheduled for September 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 5, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Return date at 02-17-2016 02:30 pm

Atty Johnson states he was recently appointed and requests adjournment.  BY THE COURT:  Adjourn.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 01:45 pm.
State's
Return date at 06-18-2015 03:30 pm

Defendant Patrick Schaefer in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that there was a 2nd pre-trial conference set and the defendant did not appear at that either.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant thought that he was supposed to meet today.
Defendant would like to get an Attorney.  Court questions the defendant regarding a court appointed Attorney.  Defendant would like the court to appoint an Attorney.

BY THE COURT:  Court appoints Atty Erik Johnson.
Pay $50.00/month commencing in June.
bond continued.  Return date scheduled for June 18, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
Return date at 05-21-2015 03:30 pm

Defendant Patrick Schaefer in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that the defendant did not appear for the pre-trial conference.  Atty Hendee states that he did meet with the defendant on his traffic matter.  Defendant would like to speak with the DA.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant states that he forgot about the appointment.  Defendant waives his right to counsel to meet with the DA.

BY THE COURT:  Reset one last time.
bond continued.  Return date scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
STATEMENT OF COMPLIANCE
Return date on April 1, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

Court questions the defendant.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney in order to have a conference with the District Attorney.  Court accepts defendant's waiver of Attorney.

BY THE COURT:  Set for Return.

with conditions:
*No contact with Joan Partington
*Absolute Sobriety; zero tolerance

Defendant Patrick Schaefer in court, in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.    Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Atty Hendee requests a $250 cash bond with conditions.
Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees with the bond request.

BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $250.00 cash bond with conditions:
*No contact with Joan Partington
*Absolute Sobriety; zero tolerance  Return date scheduled for April 1, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
